effect.Name: Subtraction With Reciprocal Square Root
effect.description: Subtraction With Reciprocal Square Root - Shader subtracts base and blend colors from each other then colors are calculated by reciprocal square root
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Subtraction With Reciprocal Square Root (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader subtracts base and blend colors from each other then colors are calculated by reciprocal square root

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable determines the color of the subtractor. When the option is off, the subtractor is the background colors, and when the option is on, the subtractor is the object colors

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of background visibility
